comment: Morris (WAS) maintains legal guarding position and makes incidental contact with Ilyasova (ATL) that does not affect his drive to the basket and shot attempt.
Hardaway Jr. (ATL) makes contact to Wall's (WAS) arm that affects his driving shot attempt.
Morris (WAS) cleanly strips the ball from Howard (ATL).
Morris (WAS) makes contact with the ball and any contact with Howard (ATL) is incidental.
After communicating with the Replay Center, the ruling on the floor of a 2pt field goal by Schroder (ATL) is confirmed.
Morris (WAS) sets the screen on Schroder (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Detectable with stop watch] Howard (ATL) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Howard (ATL) makes marginal contact with Morris (WAS) that does not affect his shot attempt.
Howard (ATL) sets the screen on Morris (WAS) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Gortat (WAS) makes contact to Ilyasova's (ATL) body that affects his driving shot attempt.
Gortat (WAS) sets the screen on Schroder (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
[Detectable with stop watch] Howard (ATL) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Gortat (WAS) sets the screen on Sefolosha (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Howard (ATL) sets the screen on Porter Jr. (WAS) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Wall (WAS) cleanly deflects the ball away from Schroder (ATL).
Wall (WAS) and Schroder (ATL) makes incidental contact with one another during the loose ball.
[Incidental or immaterial] Howard (ATL) is in the paint without actively guarding an opponent for longer than three seconds.
Beal (WAS) makes contact with Hardaway Jr. (ATL) that affects his FOM.
Prince (ATL) commits a take foul on Beal (WAS).
Schroder (ATL) commits a take foul on Wall (WAS).
